text:
ACT SAT Prep How to calculate percent price increase

[imath] \mathbf{O} [/imath]\n0\nTo keep up with rising commercial property taxes a parking lot owner\nneeds to raise the monthly parking rate of [imath] \$ 130 [/imath] by [imath] 25 \% . [/imath] What will be the new monthly parking rates?
